sources.title: Woman on the Edge | Full Drama Thriller Movie | Rumer Willis
sources.description:
***This film is under non-exclusive license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***

Woman on the Edge - Following the suicide of her sister, an investigative journalist discovers that it may be linked to a number of recent murders that are set up to look like suicides.

2018
Stars: Rumer Willis, Jeffery Patterson, Michael Sirow
